Verify the 'Select Ticket Type' dropdown displays 'Standard' as its default value and has a width of 250px
Verify the 'Agree to Terms' checkbox is unchecked by default and its associated label text is 'I agree to the terms and conditions'
Verify the 'Submit' button has background #007bff, text color #ffffff, and is initially enabled
Navigate to 'https://music.streaming.com/player/123'
Verify the video player's dimensions are 960x540px
Verify the video element is not muted by default and its aspect ratio is 16/9
Verify the 'Play/Pause' button is visible, has width 50px, height 50px, and its icon fill color is #ffffff
Verify the progress bar's filled section has background color #ff0000 and represents 75% of the total width
Verify the volume slider's value is 80%, and the mute icon is 'volume_up.svg'
Verify the 'Fullscreen' button is displayed with an 'expand_icon.svg' and is clickable
Click the 'Play' button
Verify the 'Play/Pause' button's icon changes to 'pause_icon.svg' and the video status changes to 'playing'
Access 'https://docs.app/faq'
Verify the first accordion item's header, 'What is your refund policy?', has background color #f8f9fa and font weight 600
Verify the content area for this item is initially hidden with max-height 0 and overflow hidden
Verify each accordion item has a bottom margin of 10px and a border 1px solid #dee2e6
Click the first accordion item's header
Verify the content area expands with a transition duration of 300ms ease-out
Verify the expansion indicator icon 'chevron_down.svg' rotates 180 degrees when the accordion item is active
Verify the active accordion content area displays text with font size 14px, color #666666, and padding 15px
Open 'https://dev.portal/api-docs'
Verify the 'Endpoint Details' link has cursor 'help' and text decoration 'underline'
Hover over the 'Endpoint Details' link
Verify a tooltip appears within 200ms

Verify the tooltip has background #333333, text color #ffffff, padding 8px 12px, border radius 4px, font size 12px, content 'View detailed API endpoint information', is positioned 10px above the trigger link, and has z-index 9999
Verify the tooltip does not contain any images or interactive elements
Move the mouse away from the 'Endpoint Details' link
Verify the tooltip fades out with opacity transition 150ms ease
Navigate to 'https://dashboard.app/settings'
Verify the tabbed interface has 3 tabs: 'General', 'Security', 'Notifications'
Verify the tab list uses display 'flex' and has a bottom margin of 20px
Verify each tab item has padding 10px 15px and border 1px solid #cccccc
Verify the 'General' tab is active, indicated by background #ffffff, border bottom color #ffffff, and font weight bold
Verify inactive tabs have background #f0f0f0 and text color #666666
Verify the content panel for the active tab is visible, has a minimum height of 200px, and padding 20px
Click the 'Security' tab
Verify the 'Security' tab becomes active, changing its background to #ffffff and its text color to #333333
Visit 'https://product.review/item/101'
Verify the star rating component displays 5 star icons
Verify 4 of the star icons are filled with color #ffd700 and the last one is filled with #e0e0e0
Verify each star icon has a width of 24px and height of 24px
Verify each star element has a cursor 'pointer' and scales to 1.1 on hover
Verify the average rating text displays '4.0 out of 5 stars' with font size 16px and color #333333
Verify the 'Write a Review' button is visible, has background #007bff, text color #ffffff, and padding 10px 20px
Verify the overall review count states '1,234 customer reviews' with font weight 500
Open 'https://home.page/slider'
Verify the main hero slider has exactly 3 slides, each with a width of 100% and a height of 500px
Verify the current slide transitions horizontally with a transform translation duration of 500ms ease

Verify the 'Next' and 'Previous' navigation arrows are visible, positioned vertically centered on the left and right edges, each with background rgba(0,0,0,0.5), color #ffffff, width 40px, height 40px, and border radius 50%

Verify the active dot has background #333333
Verify the first slide's primary heading is 'Discover Your Adventure' with font size 48px, color #ffffff, and text shadow '2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.5)'

Verify the numerical values are displayed with text size 48px, font family 'Digital-7', and color #ff0000
Verify separator colons are present between the segments and have font size 40px
